channel.title: Comments on: I Hate Feeling Helpless
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Thanks, I will.
I went to a barbecue tonight and when a friend offered to be the driver I went with it. It's very rare that I'm reluctant to drive, but today was one of these times.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks, I will.

I went to a barbecue tonight and when a friend offered to be the driver I went with it. It’s very rare that I’m reluctant to drive, but today was one of these times.

item.title: By: rom
item.dc:creator: rom
item.description: Wow, try to have relaxed weekend from now on...
item.content:encoded: Wow, try to have relaxed weekend from now on…
